attributes.action: I would like my Government to start funding Metal concerts of all genres.
attributes.additional_details:
Funding for such events and talent from the Treasury would be greatly appreciated from the masses of all ages, Metal events have not been on the Governments to-do list, and with the help from the Members of Parliament, events such as, would sky rocket morale within the UK which would then bolster support for future endeavours for the leading party within Parliament, I and hundreds of thousands of fans who love are music with a passion, would like to see this passed to the members that be

Thanks
attributes.background: I would like my Government to start funding Metal concerts of all genres. I think this is important to the masses to enjoy themselves through a supported chain which is led by Government funding. Genres from Death, Black, Thrash, Industrial, Viking and more, it is imperative that this happens.
